definition: to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: At present, offering two specialties in textile design and fashion design.
sentences.chinese: 現有染織藝術設計和服裝藝術設計兩個專業方向。

sentences.english: Hand dyeing is an ancient art.
sentences.chinese: 手繪是一門古老的染織藝術。

definition: Hunan embroidery, one of the four major traditional styles of Chinese embroidery (the other three being 蘇繡|苏绣[Su1 xiu4], 粵繡|粤绣[Yue4 xiu4] and 蜀繡|蜀绣[Shu3 xiu4])
Guangdong embroidery, one of the four major traditional styles of Chinese embroidery (the other three being 蘇繡|苏绣[Su1 xiu4], 湘繡|湘绣[Xiang1 xiu4] and 蜀繡|蜀绣[Shu3 xiu4])
to make a significant advance in one's career (idiom)/to get one's big break
(music) to change key/modulation/(of an employee) to be transferred to another post
doubts and suspicions/a maze of doubts/puzzle/mystery
to win by a surprise move
